trans-unit.source: Setting allows_duplicate_labels=False ensures that the index (and columns of a DataFrame) are unique. Most methods that accept and return a Series or DataFrame will propagate the value of allows_duplicate_labels.

trans-unit.source: Setting allows_duplicate_labels=True on a Series or DataFrame with duplicate labels or performing an operation that introduces duplicate labels on a Series or DataFrame that disallows duplicates will raise an errors.DuplicateLabelError.
trans-unit.target: 在具有重复标签的 Series 或 DataFrame 上设置 allows_duplicate_labels=True 或执行在不允许重复项的 Series 或 DataFrame 上引入重复标签的操作将引发 errors.DuplicateLabelError 。DuplicateLabelError。

trans-unit.source: Setting preserve_dtypes=False will upcast to the standard pandas data types: int64 for all integer types and float64 for floating point data. By default, the Stata data types are preserved when importing.

trans-unit.source: Similar to NumPy ndarrays, pandas Index, Series, and DataFrame also provides the take() method that retrieves elements along a given axis at the given indices. trans-unit.source: Some windowing aggregation, mean, sum, var and std methods may suffer from numerical imprecision due to the underlying windowing algorithms accumulating sums. When values differ with magnitude \(1/np.finfo(np.double).eps\) this results in truncation. It must be noted, that large values may have an impact on windows, which do not include these values. Kahan summation is used to compute the rolling sums to preserve accuracy as much as possible.
trans-unit.target: 由于基本的开窗算法会累积 sum ，因此某些开窗聚合， mean ，sum， var 和 std 方法可能会出现数值不精确的情况。当值的大小不同时，\（1 / np.finfo（np.double）.eps \）会导致截断。必须注意，较大的值可能会对不包含这些值的窗口产生影响。Kahan总和用于计算滚动总和，以尽可能保持准确性。

trans-unit.source: Some workloads can be achieved with chunking: splitting a large problem like “convert this directory of CSVs to parquet” into a bunch of small problems (“convert this individual CSV file into a Parquet file. Now repeat that for each file in this directory.”). As long as each chunk fits in memory, you can work with datasets that are much larger than memory.
trans-unit.target: 分块可以实现一些工作负载：将一个大问题（如“将CSV目录转换为拼花地板”）分解为一堆小问题（“将单个CSV文件转换为Parquet文件。现在，对该目录中的每个文件重复此操作。 ”）。只要每个块都适合内存，就可以使用比内存大得多的数据集。

trans-unit.source: Sparse timeseries are the ones where you have a lot fewer points relative to the amount of time you are looking to resample. Naively upsampling a sparse series can potentially generate lots of intermediate values. When you don’t want to use a method to fill these values, e.g. fill_method is None, then intermediate values will be filled with NaN.
trans-unit.target: 相对于要重采样的时间量，稀疏时间序列的点要少得多。天真地对稀疏序列进行升采样可能会产生很多中间值。当您不想使用一种方法来填充这些值时，例如 fill_method 为 None ，则中间值将用 NaN 填充。

trans-unit.source: Specific to orient='table', if a DataFrame with a literal Index name of index gets written with to_json(), the subsequent read operation will incorrectly set the Index name to None. This is because index is also used by DataFrame.to_json() to denote a missing Index name, and the subsequent read_json() operation cannot distinguish between the two. The same limitation is encountered with a MultiIndex and any names beginning with 'level_'.
trans-unit.target: 具体到 orient='table' ，如果一个 DataFrame 与文字 Index 的名称 index 获取与写入 to_json() ,随后的读出操作将不正确设置的 Index 名称 None 。这是因为 index 也被 DataFrame.to_json() 来表示一个丢失 Index 名称，和随后的 read_json() 操作不能在两者之间进行区分。 MultiIndex 和以。开头的任何名称都遇到相同的限制 'level_' 。

trans-unit.source: Specifying dense_index=True will result in an index that is the Cartesian product of the row and columns coordinates of the matrix. Note that this will consume a significant amount of memory (relative to dense_index=False) if the sparse matrix is large (and sparse) enough.
trans-unit.target: 指定 dense_index=True 将得到一个索引，该索引是矩阵的行和列坐标的笛卡尔乘积。请注意，如果稀疏矩阵足够大（并且稀疏），这将消耗大量内存（相对于 dense_index=False ）。

trans-unit.source: Specifying dropna allows count ignoring NaN
trans-unit.target: 指定 dropna 允许忽略 NaN 的计数

trans-unit.source: Specifying dtype='category' will result in an unordered Categorical whose categories are the unique values observed in the data. For more control on the categories and order, create a CategoricalDtype ahead of time, and pass that for that column’s dtype.
trans-unit.target: 指定 dtype='category' 将导致无序 Categorical 其 categories 是数据中观察到的唯一值。为了更好地控制类别和顺序，请提前创建一个 CategoricalDtype ，并将其传递给该列的 dtype 。

trans-unit.target: 将 na 指定为 False 而不是 NaN 会将NaN值替换为 False 。如果Series或Index不包含NaN值，则结果dtype将为 bool ，否则为 object dtype。

trans-unit.source: Statsmodels is the prominent Python “statistics and econometrics library” and it has a long-standing special relationship with pandas. Statsmodels provides powerful statistics, econometrics, analysis and modeling functionality that is out of pandas’ scope. Statsmodels leverages pandas objects as the underlying data container for computation.
trans-unit.target: Statsmodels是著名的Python“统计和计量经济学库”，它与熊猫有着长期的特殊关系。Statsmodels提供了强大的统计，计量经济学，分析和建模功能，而这在熊猫的范围之外。Statsmodels利用pandas对象作为基础数据容器进行计算。

trans-unit.source: Strings passed as the on, left_on, and right_on parameters may refer to either column names or index level names. This enables merging DataFrame instances on a combination of index levels and columns without resetting indexes.
trans-unit.target: 作为 on ， left_on 和 right_on 参数传递的字符串可以引用列名称或索引级别名称。这样就可以在索引级别和列的组合上合并 DataFrame 实例，而无需重置索引。

trans-unit.source: The query() method uses a slightly modified Python syntax by default. For example, the & and | (bitwise) operators have the precedence of their boolean cousins, and and or. This is syntactically valid Python, however the semantics are different.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， query() 方法使用经过稍微修改的Python语法。例如， & 和 | （按位）运算符具有其布尔表亲 and 和 or 的优先级。这在语法上是有效的Python，但是语义不同。

trans-unit.source: The concat() function (in the main pandas namespace) does all of the heavy lifting of performing concatenation operations along an axis while performing optional set logic (union or intersection) of the indexes (if any) on the other axes. Note that I say “if any” because there is only a single possible axis of concatenation for Series.
trans-unit.target: 所述 concat() 函数（在主大熊猫命名空间）执行所有沿轴线进行级联的操作，而在其他轴进行索引的可选的一组逻辑（集或交集）（如果有的话）的繁重的。请注意，我之所以说“如有”，是因为Series只有一个可能的串联轴。

trans-unit.source: The cut() function computes groupings for the values of the input array and is often used to transform continuous variables to discrete or categorical variables:

trans-unit.target: 该 apply() 方法也将派遣一个字符串的方法名。

trans-unit.source: The combine_first() method above calls the more general DataFrame.combine(). This method takes another DataFrame and a combiner function, aligns the input DataFrame and then passes the combiner function pairs of Series (i.e., columns whose names are the same).

trans-unit.target: Series和DataFrame上的 idxmin() 和 idxmax() 函数使用最小和最大对应值计算索引标签：

trans-unit.source: The itertuples() method will return an iterator yielding a namedtuple for each row in the DataFrame. The first element of the tuple will be the row’s corresponding index value, while the remaining values are the row values.
trans-unit.target: 所述 itertuples() 方法将返回一个迭代产生用于数据帧的每一行一个namedtuple。元组的第一个元素将是行的相应索引值，而其余值是行值。

trans-unit.source: The reindex() method of Series/DataFrames can be called with another MultiIndex, or even a list or array of tuples:

trans-unit.source: The rename() method allows you to relabel an axis based on some mapping (a dict or Series) or an arbitrary function.
trans-unit.target: 通过 rename() 方法，您可以基于某些映射（dict或Series）或任意函数来重新标记轴。

trans-unit.source: The rename() method also provides an inplace named parameter that is by default False and copies the underlying data. Pass inplace=True to rename the data in place.
trans-unit.target: 该 rename() 方法还提供了一个 inplace 命名的参数是默认 False 并复制的基础数据。传递 inplace=True 重命名数据。

trans-unit.source: The rename() method is used to rename the labels of a MultiIndex, and is typically used to rename the columns of a DataFrame. The columns argument of rename allows a dictionary to be specified that includes only the columns you wish to rename.
trans-unit.target: 该 rename() 方法用于重命名的标签 MultiIndex ，并且通常用于重命名的列 DataFrame 。 rename 的 columns 参数允许指定仅包含要重命名的列的字典。

trans-unit.source: The rename_axis() method is used to rename the name of a Index or MultiIndex. In particular, the names of the levels of a MultiIndex can be specified, which is useful if reset_index() is later used to move the values from the MultiIndex to a column.
trans-unit.target: 所述 rename_axis() 方法用于重命名的名称 Index 或 MultiIndex 。特别是，可以指定 MultiIndex 级别的名称，如果以后使用 reset_index() 将值从 MultiIndex 移到列时，这将很有用。

trans-unit.source: The select_dtypes() method implements subsetting of columns based on their dtype.
trans-unit.target: 该 select_dtypes() 方法实现子集划分根据自己的列 dtype 。

trans-unit.source: The stack() method “compresses” a level in the DataFrame’s columns.
trans-unit.target: 该 stack() 方法“压缩”在数据帧的列的水平。

trans-unit.source: The transform() method returns an object that is indexed the same (same size) as the original. This API allows you to provide multiple operations at the same time rather than one-by-one. Its API is quite similar to the .agg API.
trans-unit.target: 所述 transform() 方法返回被索引相同的（相同的尺寸）作为原始的对象。通过此API，您可以一次提供多个操作，而不是一个接一个地提供。它的API与 .agg API非常相似。

trans-unit.source: The value_counts() method can be used to count combinations across multiple columns. By default all columns are used but a subset can be selected using the subset argument.
trans-unit.target: 所述 value_counts() 方法可被用于计算在多个列的组合。默认情况下，使用所有列，但是可以使用 subset 参数选择一个子集。

trans-unit.source: The MultiIndex object is the hierarchical analogue of the standard Index object which typically stores the axis labels in pandas objects. You can think of MultiIndex as an array of tuples where each tuple is unique. A MultiIndex can be created from a list of arrays (using MultiIndex.from_arrays()), an array of tuples (using MultiIndex.from_tuples()), a crossed set of iterables (using MultiIndex.from_product()), or a DataFrame (using MultiIndex.from_frame()). The Index constructor will attempt to return a MultiIndex when it is passed a list of tuples. The following examples demonstrate different ways to initialize MultiIndexes.
trans-unit.target: 的 MultiIndex 对象是标准的分级类似物 Index ，其典型地存储在大熊猫对象轴标签对象。您可以将 MultiIndex 视为一个元组数组，其中每个元组都是唯一的。阿 MultiIndex 可以从阵列的列表来创建（使用 MultiIndex.from_arrays() ),元组的阵列（使用 MultiIndex.from_tuples() ），一个交叉组iterables（使用的 MultiIndex.from_product() ），或一个 DataFrame （使用 MultiIndex.from_frame() ）。该 Index 构造函数将试图返回一个 MultiIndex 当它传递一个元组列表时。以下示例演示了初始化MultiIndexes的不同方法。

trans-unit.source: The read_excel() method can also read binary Excel files using the pyxlsb module. The semantics and features for reading binary Excel files mostly match what can be done for Excel files using engine='pyxlsb'. pyxlsb does not recognize datetime types in files and will return floats instead.
trans-unit.target: 该 read_excel() 方法还可以阅读使用二进制Excel文件 pyxlsb 模块。读取二进制Excel文件的语义和功能大部分与使用 engine='pyxlsb' 对Excel文件所做的匹配。 pyxlsb 无法识别文件中的日期时间类型，而是返回浮点数。

trans-unit.source: The read_excel() method can read Excel 2007+ (.xlsx) files using the openpyxl Python module. Excel 2003 (.xls) files can be read using xlrd. Binary Excel (.xlsb) files can be read using pyxlsb. The to_excel() instance method is used for saving a DataFrame to Excel. Generally the semantics are similar to working with csv data. See the cookbook for some advanced strategies.
trans-unit.target: 所述 read_excel() 方法可读取Excel 2007+（ .xlsx ）文件使用 openpyxl Python模块。可以使用 xlrd 读取Excel 2003（ .xls ）文件。可以使用 pyxlsb 读取二进制Excel（ .xlsb ）文件。所述 to_excel() 实例方法用于保存一个 DataFrame 到Excel。通常，语义类似于使用csv数据。有关某些高级策略，请参见本食谱。

trans-unit.target: 该 CustomBusinessHour 是的混合物 BusinessHour 和 CustomBusinessDay 它允许你指定任意假期。 CustomBusinessHour 与 BusinessHour 的工作原理相同，但它会跳过指定的自定义假日。

trans-unit.source: The DataFrame.eval method

trans-unit.source: The DataFrame object has an instance method to_string which allows control over the string representation of the object. All arguments are optional:
trans-unit.target: 该 DataFrame 的对象具有一个实例方法 to_string ，其允许在所述对象的字符串表示的控制。所有参数都是可选的：

trans-unit.source: The ExcelFile class can also be used as a context manager.
trans-unit.target: 该 ExcelFile 类也可以被用作上下文管理器。

trans-unit.source: The IntervalIndex allows some unique indexing and is also used as a return type for the categories in cut() and qcut().
trans-unit.target: 所述 IntervalIndex 允许一些独特的索引和也用作在一个返回类型的类别 cut() 和 qcut() 。

trans-unit.source: The PeriodIndex constructor can also be used directly:
trans-unit.target: 该 PeriodIndex 构造也可以直接使用：

trans-unit.source: The Series.sparse accessor may be used to access sparse-specific attributes and methods if the Series contains sparse values. See Sparse accessor for more.
trans-unit.target: 该 Series.sparse 访问可用于访问稀疏特定的属性和方法，如果该 Series 包含稀疏值。有关更多信息，请参见稀疏访问器。

trans-unit.source: The Series.str accessor is available for Series backed by a arrays.StringArray. See String handling for more.
trans-unit.target: 该 Series.str 访问可供 Series 支持由 arrays.StringArray 。有关更多信息，请参见字符串处理。

trans-unit.source: The Series and DataFrame objects have an instance method to_csv which allows storing the contents of the object as a comma-separated-values file. The function takes a number of arguments. Only the first is required.
trans-unit.target: 该 Series 和 DataFrame 的对象具有一个实例方法 to_csv 其允许存储所述对象的内容为逗号分隔值的文件。该函数带有多个参数。仅第一个是必需的。

trans-unit.source: The Series object also has a to_string method, but with only the buf, na_rep, float_format arguments. There is also a length argument which, if set to True, will additionally output the length of the Series.
trans-unit.target: 该 Series 的对象也有一个 to_string 方法，但是只有 buf ， na_rep ， float_format 参数。还有一个 length 参数，如果将其设置为 True ，则将另外输出Series的长度。

trans-unit.source: The SparseArray.dtype property stores two pieces of information
trans-unit.target: 该 SparseArray.dtype 物业存储的两条信息

trans-unit.source: The SparseDataFrame.default_kind and SparseDataFrame.default_fill_value attributes have no replacement.
trans-unit.target: 该 SparseDataFrame.default_kind 和 SparseDataFrame.default_fill_value 属性没有更换。

trans-unit.source: The and and or operators here have the same precedence that they would in vanilla Python.
trans-unit.target: 这里的 and 和 or 运算符具有与普通Python相同的优先级。

trans-unit.source: The append keyword option allow you to keep the existing index and append the given columns to a MultiIndex:
trans-unit.target: 该 append 关键字选项让你保持现有索引和给定的列追加到一个多指标：

trans-unit.source: The append_to_multiple method splits a given single DataFrame into multiple tables according to d, a dictionary that maps the table names to a list of ‘columns’ you want in that table. If None is used in place of a list, that table will have the remaining unspecified columns of the given DataFrame. The argument selector defines which table is the selector table (which you can make queries from). The argument dropna will drop rows from the input DataFrame to ensure tables are synchronized. This means that if a row for one of the tables being written to is entirely np.NaN, that row will be dropped from all tables.
trans-unit.target: 该 append_to_multiple 方法根据拆分给定一个数据帧到多个表 d ，该表名称映射到你在该表要“列”列表的字典。如果使用 None 代替列表，则该表将具有给定DataFrame的其余未指定列。参数 selector 定义哪个表是选择器表（可以从中进行查询）。参数 dropna 将从输入 DataFrame 中删除行，以确保表同步。这意味着，如果要写入其中一个表的行完全是 np.NaN ，那么该行将从所有表中删除。

trans-unit.source: The apply() function takes an extra func argument and performs generic rolling computations. The func argument should be a single function that produces a single value from an ndarray input. raw specifies whether the windows are cast as Series objects (raw=False) or ndarray objects (raw=True).
trans-unit.target: 该 apply() 函数需要一个额外的 func 参数，并进行通用计算的滚动。所述 func 参数应该是从一个输入ndarray产生单一值的单个功能。 raw 指定将窗口强制转换为 Series 对象（ raw=False ）还是ndarray对象（ raw=True ）。

trans-unit.source: The axis parameter can be set to 0 or 1 and allows you to resample the specified axis for a DataFrame.
trans-unit.target: 所述 axis 参数可被设置为0或1，并允许你重新取样指定轴为一个 DataFrame 。

trans-unit.source: The by keyword can be specified to plot grouped histograms:
trans-unit.target: 在 by 关键字可以规定为情节分组直方图：

trans-unit.target: 在 by 参数可以采取列名，如列表：

trans-unit.source: The classes argument provides the ability to give the resulting HTML table CSS classes. Note that these classes are appended to the existing 'dataframe' class.
trans-unit.target: 该 classes 参数提供给生成的HTML表CSS类的能力。请注意，这些类将追加到现有的 'dataframe' 类中。

trans-unit.source: The closed parameter specifies which endpoint is included. The default behavior is to include both endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 所述 closed 参数指定端点包括在内。默认行为是包括两个端点。

trans-unit.source: The closed parameter specifies which endpoints of the individual intervals within the IntervalIndex are closed.
trans-unit.target: 所述 closed 参数指定其内的各个区间的端点 IntervalIndex 关闭。

trans-unit.source: The columns argument will limit the columns shown:
trans-unit.target: 该 columns 参数将限制显示的列：

trans-unit.source: The columns keyword can be supplied to select a list of columns to be returned, this is equivalent to passing a 'columns=list_of_columns_to_filter':
trans-unit.target: 的 columns 的关键字可被提供给选择列的列表被返回，这等同于传递 'columns=list_of_columns_to_filter' ：

trans-unit.source: The dialect keyword gives greater flexibility in specifying the file format. By default it uses the Excel dialect but you can specify either the dialect name or a csv.Dialect instance.
trans-unit.target: 该 dialect 关键字给出指定文件格式更大的灵活性。默认情况下，它使用Excel方言，但您可以指定方言名称或 csv.Dialect 实例。

trans-unit.source: The dtype of any objects involved in an arithmetic % operation are recursively cast to float64.
trans-unit.target: 算术 % 操作中涉及的任何对象的 dtype 都递归转换为 float64 。

trans-unit.source: The encoding argument should be used for encoded unicode data, which will result in byte strings being decoded to unicode in the result:
trans-unit.target: 的 encoding 参数应该被用于编码的Unicode数据，这将导致在字节串被解码，以在结果unicode的：

trans-unit.source: The engine_kwargs argument is a dictionary of keyword arguments that will be passed into the numba.jit decorator. These keyword arguments will be applied to both the passed function (if a standard Python function) and the apply for loop over each window. Currently only nogil, nopython, and parallel are supported, and their default values are set to False, True and False respectively.
trans-unit.target: 该 engine_kwargs 参数是将要传递到参数的字典numba.jit装饰。这些关键字参数将被应用到这两个传递函数（如果是标准Python函数）和申请循环每个窗口。当前仅支持 nogil ， nopython 和 parallel ，并且它们的默认值分别设置为 False ， True 和 False 。

trans-unit.source: The errors parameter has a third option of errors='ignore', which will simply return the passed in data if it encounters any errors with the conversion to a desired data type:
trans-unit.target: 该 errors 参数具有第三种选择 errors='ignore' ，其将简单地返回在数据传递的，如果遇到与转换到所希望的数据类型的任何错误：

trans-unit.source: The expanding() method will accumulate a given operation (sum() in the example) for all the members of each particular group.
trans-unit.target: 的 expanding() 方法将积累一个给定的操作（ sum() 中的例子）对于每个特定组的所有成员。

trans-unit.source: The extract method accepts a regular expression with at least one capture group.
trans-unit.target: 该 extract 方法接受的正则表达式与至少一个捕获基团。

trans-unit.target: 该 fill_value 参数

trans-unit.source: The filter method returns a subset of the original object. Suppose we want to take only elements that belong to groups with a group sum greater than 2.
trans-unit.target: 该 filter 方法返回原始对象的子集。假设我们只想取属于组总和大于2的组的元素。

trans-unit.source: The freq indicates the span covered by each element of the array. All elements in the PeriodArray have the same freq.
trans-unit.target: 所述 freq 表示由阵列的每个元件覆盖的跨度。PeriodArray中的所有元素都具有相同的 freq 。

trans-unit.source: The freq parameter can passed a variety of frequency aliases:
trans-unit.target: 的 freq 参数可以通过各种频率别名：

trans-unit.target: 的 freq 参数可用于指定非默认的频率，并且可以利用多种频率别名与日期时间样间隔：

trans-unit.source: The freq parameter specifies the frequency between the left and right. endpoints of the individual intervals within the IntervalIndex. For numeric start and end, the frequency must also be numeric.
trans-unit.target: 该 freq 参数指定的左侧和右侧之间的频率。 IntervalIndex 中各个间隔的端点。对于数字 start 和 end ，频率也必须是数字。

trans-unit.source: The freq parameter specifies the frequency of the TimedeltaIndex. Only fixed frequencies can be passed, non-fixed frequencies such as ‘M’ (month end) will raise.
trans-unit.target: 该 freq 参数指定TimedeltaIndex的频率。只有固定频率可以通过，非固定频率（例如“ M”（月末））会提高。

trans-unit.source: The freq to use for the array. Mostly applicable when values is an ndarray of integers, when freq is required. When values is a PeriodArray (or box around), it’s checked that values.freq matches freq.
trans-unit.target: 用于数组的 freq 。当 values 是整数的ndarray 且需要 freq 时，通常适用。当 values 是PeriodArray（或方框）时，将检查 values.freq 与 freq 匹配。

trans-unit.target: 的 include 和 exclude 参数可以用于其中在列极限 DataFrame 被分析的输出。分析 Series 时将忽略参数。

trans-unit.source: The index keyword is reserved and cannot be use as a level name.
trans-unit.target: 该 index 的关键字是保留的，不能用作级别名称。

trans-unit.target: 该 indicator 参数还将接受字符串参数，在这种情况下，指标函数将使用传递的字符串的值作为指标列的名称。

trans-unit.source: The inplace keyword determines whether this assignment will performed on the original DataFrame or return a copy with the new column.
trans-unit.target: 该 inplace 关键字确定此任务是否将在原来进行 DataFrame 或新列返回副本。

trans-unit.source: The items, like, and regex parameters are enforced to be mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: 该 items ， like 和 regex 的参数执行相互排斥。

trans-unit.source: The keep parameter controls which duplicate values are removed. The value ‘first’ keeps the first occurrence for each set of duplicated entries. The default value of keep is ‘first’.
trans-unit.target: 在 keep 其重复值参数控制被删除。值“ first”使每组重复项保持第一次出现。keep的默认值为“ first”。

trans-unit.source: The level parameter is interesting for Series with a multi-level index.
trans-unit.target: 该 level 的参数很有趣的系列具有多级索引。

trans-unit.target: 所述 method 参数也可以是一个可调用的用于通用相关计算。在这种情况下，它应该是一个从两个ndarray输入生成单个值的单个函数。假设我们要基于直方图交点来计算相关性：

trans-unit.source: The method argument gives access to fancier interpolation methods. If you have scipy installed, you can pass the name of a 1-d interpolation routine to method. You’ll want to consult the full scipy interpolation documentation and reference guide for details. The appropriate interpolation method will depend on the type of data you are working with.
trans-unit.target: 使用 method 参数可以访问更高级的插值方法。如果已安装scipy，则可以将1-d插值例程的名称传递给 method 。您需要查阅完整的scipy插值文档和参考指南以获取详细信息。适当的插值方法将取决于您使用的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The method argument within DataFrame.corr can accept a callable in addition to the named correlation types. Here we compute the distance correlation <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Distance_correlation>``__ matrix for a ``DataFrame object.
trans-unit.target: 除了命名的关联类型之外， DataFrame.corr 中的 method 参数还可以接受Callable。在这里，我们 distance correlation <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Distance_correlation>``__ matrix for a ``DataFrame 对象计算距离相关<https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Distance_correlation>``__矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The n largest elements where n=3 and keeping the last duplicates. Brunei will be kept since it is the last with value 434000 based on the index order.
trans-unit.target: 该 n 最大的元素，其中 n=3 ，保持最后的重复。文莱将保留，因为它是最后一个基于索引顺序的值434000。

trans-unit.target: 最大的 n 个元素，默认情况下 n=5 。
